meanings.definition: A plant sterol found in various vegetable oils and soybeans.
meanings.sent1: Soybeans contain stigmasterol, a natural substance.
meanings.sent2: Vegetable oils are a good source of stigmasterol.
meanings.sent3: The soybean whispered to the vegetable oil, 'I have more stigmasterol than you!'
meanings.sent4: In the land of vegetable oils, stigmasterol reigns as the king of sterols.
meanings.sent5: Imagine stigmasterol as the superhero protecting soybeans from harm.

meanings.definition: A compound used in the production of certain pharmaceuticals.
meanings.sent1: Pharmaceutical companies rely on stigmasterol for making medicines.
meanings.sent2: The production of some drugs involves the use of stigmasterol.
meanings.sent3: The stigmasterol molecule danced happily in the pharmaceutical lab.
meanings.sent4: Stigmasterol is the secret ingredient that gives some medicines their power.
meanings.sent5: The pharmaceutical world revolves around the versatility of stigmasterol.
